xxl.core.collections.queues.io
Class RandomAccessFileQueue.InputStreamFactory

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.functions.Function<Object,InputStream>
      xxl.core.collections.queues.io.RandomAccessFileQueue.InputStreamFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Enclosing class:
RandomAccessFileQueue<E>
public class RandomAccessFileQueue.InputStreamFactory
extends Function<Object,InputStream>

A function that opens an input stream for reading the serialized elements of the queue and returns it.
The implementation of this function opens the random access file queue first. Thereafter the file pointer of the random access file is set to readOffset and an input stream is returned, that redirects every calls to one of its methods to the corresponding method of the random access file.

See Also:
